duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the document control system to meet quality management system requirements.
Manage and control regulated documentation to meet industry standards.
Coordinate document training and maintain document training records.
Support Quality Management in document reviews, audits, and improvement of procedures.
Order office supplies and manage daily office operations.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years' experience in Quality Management System implementation or equivalent training and experience.
Intermediate PC skills and strong listening skills.
Ability to communicate effectively with co-workers, customers, and management.
